ctx: intros s a p d0 d1 HrefOk_s_d1 HrefOk_M1_d0.
tactic: destruct s as [s|]; destruct d0 as [d0|]; destruct d1 as [d1|]; try discriminate.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 3 branches.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (s : state) (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (d0 d1 : preDTA), state_ref_ok s d1 -> state_ref_ok (M1 prec_list a p) d0 -> state_ref_ok (s_produit_l a p s) (preDTA_produit d0 d1)

Premises:
state_ref_ok = fun (s : state) (d : preDTA) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> prec_list_ref_ok p d : state -> preDTA -> Prop
ad = N : Set
preDTA_produit = fix preDTA_produit (d0 d1 : preDTA) {struct d1} : preDTA := match d0 with | @M0 _ => match d1 with | @M0 _ | _ => M0 state end | @M1 _ a0 s0 => match d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a1 s1 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M1 state a1 s1) | @M2 _ s10 s11 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M2 state s10 s11) end | @M2 _ s00 s01 => match d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a1 s1 => preDTA_produit
state = Map prec_list : Set
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
s_produit_l = fix s_produit_l (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (s : state) {struct s} : state := match s with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a' p' => if (a =? a')%N then M1 prec_list a (pl_produit p p') else M0 prec_list | @M2 _ s0 s1 => match a with | 0%N => M2 prec_list (s_produit_l 0%N p s0) (M0 prec_list) | N.pos (q'~1)%positive => M2 prec_list (M0 prec_list) (s_produit_l (N.pos q') p s1) | N.pos (q'~0)%positive => M2 prec_list (s_pro
M1 : forall A : Type, ad -> A -> Map A
pl_produit_ref_ok : forall (p0 p1 : prec_list) (d0 d1 : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok p0 d0 -> prec_list_ref_ok p1 d1 -> prec_list_ref_ok (pl_produit p0 p1) (preDTA_produit d0 d1)
pl_produit_rec_0 : forall tl : term_list, (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u -> reconnaissance d1 a1 u -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) u) -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path.pl_path), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> pl_path.pl_path_recon d0 tl plp0 -> pl_path.pl_path_recon d1 tl plp1 -> pl_path.pl_path_recon (preDTA_produit d0 d1) tl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1)
state_ref_ok_M2_destr : forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok (M2 prec_list s0 s1) d -> state_ref_ok s0 d /\ state_ref_ok s1 d
preDTA_produit_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (preDTA_produit d0 d1) sigma
pl_produit_rec_2 : forall tl : term_list, (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) u -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u /\ reconnaissance d1 a1 u) -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (plp : pl_path.pl_path), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> pl_path.pl_path_recon (preDTA_produit d0 d1) tl plp -> exists plp0 plp1 : pl_path.pl_path, plp = pl_path_product plp0 plp1 /\ pl_path.pl_path_recon d0 tl plp0 /\ pl_path.pl_path_recon d1 tl plp1
predta_inter_direct : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (t : term), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t -> reconnaissance d1 a1 t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t
predta_inter_reciproque : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (t : term), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t /\ reconnaissance d1 a1 t
state_ref_ok_check_complete : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok_check s d = true -> state_ref_ok s d
state_ref_ok_check_correct : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok s d -> state_ref_ok_check s d = true
predta_inter_def_0 = fun t : term => forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t -> reconnaissance d1 a1 t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t : term -> Prop
predta_inter_def_1 = fun t : term => forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t /\ reconnaissance d1 a1 t : term -> Prop
predta_produit_5 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit d0 d1) a = Some s -> exists (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), a = iad_conv a0 a1 /\ MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 /\ MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1
predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign (M2 state d0 d1) sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma /\ predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma
predta_produit_2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) = Some (s_produit s0 s1)
pl_produit_rec_3 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n : nat), liste_reconnait (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (pl_produit pl0 pl1) tl -> predta_compatible d0 d1 -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d2 d3 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d2 d3 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d2 d3) (iad_conv a0 a1) u -> reconnaissance d2 a0 u /\ reconnaissance d3 a1 u) -> liste_reconnait d0 pl0 tl /\ liste_reconnait d1 pl1 tl
pl_produit_rec_1 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), liste_reconnait d0 pl0 tl -> liste_reconnait d1 pl1 tl -> pl_tl_length pl0 (lst_length tl) -> pl_tl_length pl1 (lst_length tl) -> predta_compatible d0 d1 -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d2 d3 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d2 d3 -> reconnaissance d2 a0 u -> reconnaissance d3 a1 u -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d2 d3) (iad_conv a0 a1) u) -> liste_reconnait (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (pl_produit pl0 pl1) tl
sproductl_0 : forall (s : state) (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r0 r1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l a p s) c = Some (pl_produit r0 r1)
predta_compatible_compat_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1 : preDTA -> Prop
sproductl_1 : forall (s : state) (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l a p s) c = Some r -> exists r0 r1 : prec_list, MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1
preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d < -> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)
preDTA_ref_ok_distinct = fun d d' : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d' : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
sproductl_0_def = fun s : state => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r0 r1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l a p s) c = Some (pl_produit r0 r1) : state -> Prop
sproductr_0 : forall (s : state) (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r0 r1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit_r a p s) c = Some (pl_produit r1 r0)
st_produit_l_correct_wrt_sign_invar_with_offset : forall (s0 : state) (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M1 prec_list a p) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (s_produit_l a p s0) sigma pa
sproductl_1_def = fun s : state => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l a p s) c = Some r -> exists r0 r1 : prec_list, MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1 : state -> Prop
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
sproductr_1 : forall (s : state) (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (s_produit_r a p s) c = Some r -> exists r0 r1 : prec_list, MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1
inter = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 a0 => match d1 with | dta p1 a1 => dta (preDTA_produit p0 p1) (iad_conv a0 a1) end end : DTA -> DTA -> DTA
sproductr_0_def = fun s : state => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r0 r1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit_r a p s) c = Some (pl_produit r1 r0) : state -> Prop

```coq
intros s a p d0 d1 HrefOk_s_d1 HrefOk_M1_d0.
destruct s as [s|]; destruct d0 as [d0|]; destruct d1 as [d1|]; try discriminate.
unfold state_ref_ok, M1 in *; simpl in *.
destruct (MapGet _ _ _) eqn:Heq_s_d1; destruct (MapGet _ _ _) eqn:Heq_M1_d0; try discriminate.
unfold state_ref_ok, M1 in *; simpl in *.
split.
- intros a' p' Heq_a_p'; apply pl_produit_ref_ok with (p0 := p) (p1 := p') (d0 := d0) (d1 := d1); auto.
- split.
  + apply state_ref_ok_check_complete with (s := s) (d := d0); auto.
  + apply state_ref_ok_check_correct with (s := s) (d := d0); auto.
Qed.

original: intros s a p d0 d1 HrefOk_s_d1 HrefOk_M1_d0. destruct s as [s|]; destruct d0 as [d0|]; destruct d1 as [d1|]; try discriminate. unfold state_ref_ok, M1 in *; simpl in *. destruct (MapGet _ _ _) eqn:Heq_s_d1; destruct (MapGet _ _ _) eqn:Heq_M1_d0; try discriminate. unfold state_ref_ok, M1 in *; simpl in *. split. - intros a' p' Heq_a_p'; apply pl_produit_ref_ok with (p0 := p) (p1 := p') (d0 := d0) (d1 := d1); auto. - split. + apply state_ref_ok_check_complete with (s := s) (d := d0); auto. + apply state_ref_ok_check_correct with (s := s) (d := d0); auto.
